alert.note: Alert for Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jones, central Craven and west central Pamlico Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Bern, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Tuscarora, Rhems, Olympia, Riverdale, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Fairfield Harbour, Bridgeton and Pollocksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
